issue.title: Splitwise App
issue.body:
## Build expense-sharing app

**Features:**
- Google OAuth login
- Create groups, add expenses
- Split equally, view balances

**Tech:** Next.js 14, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, SQLite, NextAuth.js

**Pages:** Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail

ems.task: Create project foundation with Next.js 14 setup, including package.json with all dependencies (NextAuth, Google OAuth provider, better-sqlite3, shadcn/ui, Tailwind), tsconfig.json with strict mode, .gitignore for Next.js, and initialize basic project structure (app/ directory, components/, lib/, prisma/ for SQLite schema).
ems.error: No workers merged - all had conflicts

ems.task: Implement authentication system and database layer. Create NextAuth.js configuration with Google OAuth provider, design and implement SQLite database schema for users, groups, expenses, and balances using Prisma ORM. Build all database models, migrations, and seed data. Owns: lib/auth.ts, lib/prisma.ts, prisma/schema.prisma, app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts.

workers.task: Create Prisma schema with all database models (User, Group, Expense, Balance, Account). Set up Prisma client configuration. Run initial migration and create seed script with test data.
Implement NextAuth.js configuration with Google OAuth provider. Create API route handler for NextAuth. Configure JWT strategy and session management. Set up environment variable requirements.

Create database utility functions for common operations (getUserByEmail, createUser, getGroupById, createExpense, etc.). Implement transaction helpers for expense creation with balance updates. Add database error handling wrapper.

ems.task: Build core application logic and API routes. Implement group creation/management, expense creation with equal splitting logic, balance calculation algorithms, and all CRUD operations. Create RESTful API endpoints for groups and expenses. Owns: app/api/groups/, app/api/expenses/, lib/calculations.ts, lib/actions.ts for server actions.

workers.task: Create database schema and models for groups and expenses. Set up SQLite database with Prisma ORM. Define Group, Expense, User, and GroupMember models with relationships. Owns: prisma/schema.prisma, lib/db.ts (database client initialization)

Implement balance calculation algorithms and expense splitting logic. Create functions to calculate equal splits, compute user balances within groups, and determine who owes whom. Owns: lib/calculations.ts

Create RESTful API routes for group CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete groups, add/remove members). Implement server actions for group management. Owns: app/api/groups/route.ts, app/api/groups/[id]/route.ts, app/api/groups/[id]/members/route.ts

ems.task: Create all UI components and pages. Build landing page, login/logout flow, dashboard with group overview, group detail pages with expense lists and balance views. Integrate shadcn/ui components (Button, Card, Input, Dialog, etc.) with Tailwind styling. Owns: app/page.tsx, app/login/page.tsx, app/dashboard/page.tsx, app/group/[id]/page.tsx, components/ui/, components/expense-form.tsx, components/balance-card.tsx.

workers.task: Create landing page and authentication flow. Build app/page.tsx (landing page with hero section and CTA), app/login/page.tsx (OAuth login page), components/landing/hero.tsx, components/landing/features.tsx. Install and configure shadcn/ui Button, Card, and Input components. No authentication logic - only UI pages and components.

Create dashboard and group overview UI. Build app/dashboard/page.tsx (main dashboard with groups list), components/dashboard/group-list.tsx, components/dashboard/group-card.tsx, components/ui/dialog.tsx. Install and configure shadcn/ui Dialog component. Display groups grid with create group button (no API calls - UI structure only).

Create group detail pages and expense/balance components. Build app/group/[id]/page.tsx (group detail with expenses and balances), components/expense-form.tsx (add expense form), components/expense-list.tsx (display expenses), components/balance-card.tsx (show member balances), components/ui/label.tsx, components/ui/textarea.tsx. Install and configure shadcn/ui Label and Textarea components. UI structure only - no API integration.

analysisSummary: Build a complete expense-sharing application with Google OAuth authentication, group management, expense tracking, and balance calculations. Tech stack: Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui components, SQLite database, and NextAuth.js.
